com.vmware.appliance.networking.dns

Interface Servers

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ServersTypes, Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ServersStub

    public interface Servers
extends Service, ServersTypes
    Servers interface provides methods DNS server configuration.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.vmware.appliance.networking.dns.ServersTypes

        void set(ServersTypes.DNSServerConfig config)
        Set the DNS server configuration. If you set the mode argument to "DHCP", a DHCP refresh is forced.
